Welcome to 888 Int'l Market

888 Int'l Market is the largest International Market in the Kansas City area. We have a wide variety of Asian groceries, general items, electric appliances, cosmetics and many other products at our store. Our restaurant offer exquisite foods for authentic tastes from all over the world.

Here are some of our more popular selections at 888 Int'l Market:

  • Produce: From traditional fruits & vegetables to Asian essentials
  • Grocery: Variety of fresh, frozen and dry products for Asian cooking
  • Bakery: Fresh baked breads, delicious cakes, etc
  • Cafe: Just name a few - Noodle Soups, Dumplings, Bubble Tea...
